pr_title: documentation: add missing docstrings in JvmFilterContext

timeline.message:
documentation: add missing docstrings in JvmFilterContext

Signed-off-by: Mike Schore <mike.schore@gmail.com>

timeline.author: rebello95

replies.bodyText: technically it is an Object[] but it's declared as Object to make the JNI lookup consistent.
replies.author: goaway

timeline.author: rebello95
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -139,7 +145,13 @@ public Object onResumeRequest(long headerCount, byte[] data, long trailerCount,
   }
 
   /**
+   * Invokes onResumeResponse callback with pending HTTP entities.
    *
+   * @param headerCount,  total pending headers included in the header block.
+   * @param data,         buffered body data.
+   * @param trailerCount, total pending trailers included in the trailer block.
+   * @param endStream,    whether the stream is closed at this point.
+   * @return Object[],    tuple of status with updated entities to be forwarded.
